methods: abstract void lock() Acquires the lock.
abstract void lockInterruptibly() Acquires the lock unless the current thread is interrupted.
abstract Condition newCondition() Returns a new Condition instance that is bound to this Lock instance.
abstract boolean tryLock() Acquires the lock only if it is free at the time of invocation.
abstract boolean tryLock(long time, TimeUnit unit) Acquires the lock if it is free within the given waiting time and the current thread has not been interrupted.
abstract void unlock() Releases the lock.
